/home/hery/git/src/Engine/builder.py

00001 """
00002 QSOS-Engine's builder module.
00003 
00004 This module provides all required tools to build a qsos evaluation sheet from
00005 splitted repository's qscore, qin and qtpl files
00006 """
00007 ##
00008 #    @defgroup builder Builder
00009 #    @ingroup Engine 
00010 #    @author Hery Randriamanamihaga
00011 
00012 from Engine import document
00013 from Engine import family
00014 from xml.dom import minidom
00015 import os
00016 
00017 ##
00018 #    @ingroup builder
00019 #
00020 def build(name, version, repositoryroot=".."):
00021     """
00022     Builds name-version's qsos evaluation document
00023     
00024     @param name
00025             Application name.
00026     @param version
00027             Application version.
00028     @param repositoryroot
00029             Path to local repository's root.
00030             Default value is ..
00031     @return
00032         Builded Document object of name-version's qsos evaluation
00033     """
00034     #Read the template of requested evaluation from repository
00035     template = "-".join([name,version])
00036     template = ".".join([template,"qtpl"])
00037     template = os.path.join(repositoryroot,"sheets","templates",template)
00038     template = file(template).read()
00039     template = "".join([line.strip() for line in (template.splitlines())])
00040     
00041     #Extract template contents
00042     content = minidom.parseString(template).firstChild.lastChild.childNodes
00043     
00044     #Extract properties from template contents
00045     properties = dict([(node.tagName,node.firstChild.data) for node in content[0:-2]])
00046     
00047     #Build families object according to families declared from template
00048     #generic *family* must also be added to families
00049     includes = [node.firstChild.data for node in content[-1].childNodes]
00050     includes.insert(0,"generic")
00051     families ={}
00052     #Handle each family to be included
00053     for include in includes :
00054         #parse family .qin file
00055         familySheet = ".".join([include,"qscore"])
00056         familySheet = os.path.join(repositoryroot,
00057                                    "sheets",
00058                                    "evaluations",
00059                                    name,
00060                                    version,
00061                                    familySheet
00062                                    )
00063         familySheet = file(familySheet).read()
00064         familySheet = "".join([line.strip() for line in familySheet.splitlines()])
00065         xml = minidom.parseString(familySheet).firstChild
00066         
00067         #extract directly interesting information :
00068         #    - authors
00069         #    - dates
00070         [h, elt] = xml.childNodes
00071         [a,d]=h.childNodes
00072         
00073         authors =[(n.firstChild.data,e.firstChild.data) 
00074                   for [n,e] in [i.childNodes for i in a.childNodes]]
00075         #Dates can be not provided on .qin files, in which case, empty string
00076         #is assumed to be date value
00077         value = lambda x : (x and [x.data] or [""])[0]
00078         dates = (value(d.firstChild.firstChild),value(d.lastChild.firstChild))
00079         
00080         #Scores and comments extraction loop
00081         scores = {}
00082         comments = {}
00083         for node in elt.childNodes :
00084             n = node.getAttribute("name")
00085             v = node.getElementsByTagName("score")
00086             if v : scores[n] = v[0].firstChild.data 
00087             v = node.getElementsByTagName("comment")
00088             if v : comments[n] = v[0].firstChild.data
00089             
00090         #Add the family into family list for the document 
00091         families[include]=family.family(authors, dates, scores, comments)
00092         
00093     #Create and return the expected documents
00094     return document.Document(properties,families)
00095     
00096 ##
00097 #    @ingroup builder
00098 #
00099 def assembleSheet(document, repositoryroot=".."):
00100     """
00101     Generate the qsos XML file corresponding to givent document object
00102     
00103     @param document
00104         Evaluation's document object.
00105         
00106     @param repositoryroot
00107         Path to repository's root.
00108         Defalut value is ..
00109     @return
00110         qsos XML string flow of document's content
00111     """
00112     #Create the global frame of the qsos document
00113     sheet = minidom.Document()
00114     root = sheet.createElement("document")
00115     header = sheet.createElement("header")
00116     authors = sheet.createElement("authors")
00117     dates = sheet.createElement("dates")
00118     header.appendChild(authors)
00119     header.appendChild(dates)
00120     root.appendChild(header)
00121     
00122     #Lambda fucntions :
00123     #    * add a text node in an element
00124     #    * check if the element has the child node and create it if not
00125     
00126     addTextNode = lambda element,tag,text :                                     \
00127                     element.                                                    \
00128                         getElementsByTagName(tag).item(0).                      \
00129                         appendChild(sheet.createTextNode(text))
00130                         
00131     checkChildNode = lambda element,tag :                                       \
00132                     element.                                                    \
00133                             getElementsByTagName(tag)                           \
00134                         or                                                      \
00135                             element.appendChild(sheet.createElement(tag))
00136     
00137     #Fill in header with properties
00138     for item in document["properties"] :
00139         tag = sheet.createElement(item)
00140         tag.appendChild(sheet.createTextNode(document["properties"][item]))
00141         header.appendChild(tag)
00142     families = document["families"].keys()
00143     
00144     #Add blank qsos evaluation of families
00145     for item in families :
00146         include = ".".join([item, "qin"])
00147         include = os.path.join(repositoryroot,"sheets","families",include)
00148         include = file(include).read()
00149         include = "".join([line.strip() for line in include.splitlines()])
00150         include = minidom.parseString(include).firstChild
00151         for section in include.childNodes[1:]:
00152             root.appendChild(section)
00153     
00154     #Finalize the blank  document
00155     sheet.appendChild(root)
00156     
00157             
00158     sheet = minidom.parseString(sheet.toxml())
00159     
00160     #Define ID tag for the document
00161     for elements in sheet.getElementsByTagName("element") :
00162         elements.setIdAttribute("name")
00163     
00164     #Fill-in evaluations' section with families data
00165     for item in document["families"] :
00166         scores = document[item].scores.copy()
00167         comments = document[item].comments.copy()
00168         
00169         #Iterate over families' contents :
00170         #  (Scores and comments are duplicated so destructive iteration
00171         #   won't affect families reference to them)
00172         #
00173         #    -Proceed first with elements with score :
00174         #        * Begin with fetching the element and corresponding score
00175         #        * Check if element has score tag (and add if so not)
00176         #        * Check if element has comment component and fill-in the tag
00177         #            (create it if doesn't exist yet)
00178         #    -Do the same with remaining comments
00179 
00180         while scores :
00181             (element,score) = scores.popitem()
00182             e =  sheet.getElementById(element)
00183             
00184             checkChildNode(e,"score")
00185             addTextNode(e,"score",score)
00186             
00187             if element in comments :
00188                 checkChildNode(e,"comment")
00189                 addTextNode(e,"comment",comments.pop(element))
00190                 
00191         while comments :
00192             (element, comment) = comments.popitem()
00193             e =  sheet.getElementById(element)
00194             checkChildNode(e,"comment")
00195             addTextNode(e,"comment",comment)
00196             
00197     return sheet.toprettyxml("\t", "\n", "utf-8")
Generated on Mon Jun 16 14:47:10 2008 for QSOS-Upgrade by  1.5.6
